Paragraph: In conclusion , with this case we illustrate that telaprevir as well as statins are susceptible to clinical relevant drug - drug interactions .

In this paragraph, there is no mention of specific diseases being interacted with telaprevir or statins. The paragraph only discusses the interaction between the two drugs leading to clinical relevant issues.
